title: Christmas Joy
description: A Hallmark Channel original movie. Joy (Danielle Panabaker) returns home to help her Aunt Ruby pull off a winning Cookie Crawl. Childhood friend Ben Andrews (Matt Long) helps Joy open her heart to the magic of the season.
details: {"Audio languages": ["English"], "Subtitles": ["English [CC]"], "Directors": ["Monika Mitchell"], "Producers": ["Greg Malcolm", "Simon Richardson", "Vicki Sotheran"], "Starring": ["Danielle Panabaker", "Matt Long"]}
